content: Could anyone have a look at this PR? @Bhavik Mehta posted a suggestion two weeks, I disagreed, and nothing has moved ever since.
This is a simple order-theoretic PR that is blocking the definition of (algebraic geometric) constructible sets and Chevalley's theorem
This seems relatively innocuous, but I'd like @Bhavik Mehta 's opinion about the names

I prefer the ciSup_mem name, honestly. I don't agree with the argument about disambiguiation since iSup_mem_of_nonempty could very well become a lemma in the future (e.g. iSup f ∈ range f for complete lattices with well-founded ≥)
